detaileddescription.para: This function must be called after the image has been loaded or a new image is built. Usually, user programs don't need to call this directly.
Clear all memory allocated to by the error reporting system.

This function must be called after all other memory has been released and we're really ready to quit, so that any other call won't report errors. Usually, user programs don't need to call this directly.
Create a new hook for reporting errors from C to the Smalltalk environment.

simplesect.para: a number identifying the king of error for future lookups

detaileddescription.para: Signal an error in the Smalltalk environment, sending signal to he requested class.

simplesect.para: TRUE if signal succeeded, otherwise FALSE

detaileddescription.para: Create an error Context in the Smalltalk environment ready to enter a Process.
This function will show an error MessageBox on Windows CE
